title: Music Player
description: A modern music player app built with React, Redux, and Tailwind, featuring song discovery, artist details, and search via RapidAPI. It includes top charts, artist highlights, and a sleek user interface with responsive controls.

title: E Commerce Website
description: A sleek eCommerce website built with React, Vite, and Tailwind, offering a seamless shopping experience with dynamic product listings and smooth navigation. It features responsive design, efficient cart management, and easy checkout integration.

title: Community Developer
description: A vibrant developer community platform built with React, Vite, and Tailwind, offering resources, discussions, and project collaboration. It fosters innovation and learning through real-time interactions and a seamless, responsive interface.
